#include <stdio.h>
#include <stdlib.h>
#include <string.h>

// Function to compute GCD iteratively
int gcd(int a, int b) {
    while (b != 0) {
        int temp = b;
        b = a % b;
        a = temp;
    }
    return a;
}

// Function to compute left and right arrays
void compute_lr(int a[], int n, int left[], int right[]) {
    left[0] = 0;
    for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
        left[i+1] = gcd(left[i], a[i]);
    }
    right[n] = 0;
    for (int i = n-1; i >= 0; i--) {
        right[i] = gcd(right[i+1], a[i]);
    }
}

// Function to find the maximum GCD between left[i] and right[i+1]
int find_max_gcd(int left[], int right[], int n) {
    int max_gcd = 0;
    for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
        int current = gcd(left[i], right[i+1]);
        if (current > max_gcd) {
            max_gcd = current;
        }
    }
    return max_gcd;
}

// Second part's variables and functions
#define LIMIT 10000000000LL // 1e10
#define MAX_NUMBERS 350

long long l[MAX_NUMBERS];
int count = 0;

void generate_numbers(long long number, int four, int seven) {
    if (number > LIMIT) return;
    if (number > 0 && four == seven) {
        l[count++] = number;
    }
    generate_numbers(number * 10 + 4, four + 1, seven);
    generate_numbers(number * 10 + 7, four, seven + 1);
}

int find_min_ge(long long target) {
    // Sort the array
    qsort(l, count, sizeof(long long), compare);
    // Binary search for the first element >= target
    int low = 0, high = count - 1;
    int result = -1;
    while (low <= high) {
        int mid = (low + high) / 2;
        if (l[mid] >= target) {
            result = mid;
            high = mid - 1;
        } else {
            low = mid + 1;
        }
    }
    if (result == -1) return l[count-1];
    return l[result];
}

int compare(const void *a, const void *b) {
    return (*(long long*)a - *(long long*)b);
}

int main() {

    int n;
    scanf("%d", &n);

}
